2009.title: Started my BS degree
description: In Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Colorado

2011.title: First engineering internship at Cirrus Logic
description: Worked on patent applications for electrical LED designs

2012.title: Returned for second summer of internship at Cirrus Logic

2013.title: Finished BS degree, accepted first job
description: Graduated with BS in Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Colorado
Moved to Irvine, California for a electrical engineering full-time position at Western Digital

2014.title: Switched positions at WD to become an embedded software engineer
description: Changed teams in Western Digital to do more software

2016.title: Got promoted to senior embedded software engineer

2017.title: Left WD. Accepted a Graduate school research position and started MS degree
description: In Computer Science at University of California, Riverside

2019.title: Left UCR. Got married. Pursuing Front End development.
description: Left Grad School with 3.9GPA, most credits done.
Wanted to change gears once more.
